World.headline: US federal immigration agents kill 2nd Minneapolis man, sparking protests
World.summary: Federal immigration agents in Minneapolis fatally shot a second man, leading to widespread protests and calls for an end to ICE raids. The incident has reignited public anger over the use of force by federal agents in the city, raising significant concerns about accountability.
key_points: Second fatal shooting by US federal immigration agents in Minneapolis.
Incident triggered widespread protests and demands to end ICE raids.
